Name: Castries
Description: Castries is the capital city of Saint Lucia. Founded by the French in 1650, Castries now has a population of just over 11,000.

Name: Soufriere
Description: Soufriere is the former capital of Saint Lucia.

Name: Gros Islet
Description: Gros Islet is a town at the far northern end of Saint Lucia. The town itself is the newest town in Saint Lucia, having only recently been promoted from being a village.

Name: Marigot Bay
Description: Marigot Bay is a city in the country of Saint Lucia.
